__e: The last thing I need to be doing... is looking for a new night watchman.
- But what if the spy has told them
I worked here as a night guard till they shut the place down.
Any man of The Night's Watch, but not I, eh, boy?
You're not in the Night's Watch anymore, you're King in the North.
I know. And I'm the Night's Watch.
So do I. But I am the watcher.
He was the lighthouse keeper, had lots of time.
Mary... Mary, you are the light, and I am the lighthouse keeper.
Mary... Mary, you are the light, and I am the lighthouse keeper.
I asked the graveyard keeper, who told me that the same man attends my wife's grave at night two or three times every week.
He was the lighthouse keeper, had lots of time.
I don't think you meant for it to but it got out last night and attacked the caretaker and his son and then it attacked my colleagues.
The Guardian is the person who set this whole thing up.
Yes, our guardian's here, and she's clearly over 21.
It's just that Guardian is not... He's not this beacon of hope that I thought he would be.
I've been a watchman for 20 years, nothing has ever happened.
If the Keeper will not come to us, then one of us must go to him.
You say you're not your brother's keeper, but you are.
If this had been a movie, they'd call it "The Nightguard."
Whatever happened to "Am I my brother's keeper?"
